name: Swords And Paws (0.9)
description:
Swords and Paws is a roguelite rpg where you have to take care of your little puho.  Defeat the enemy in the adventure mode, play minigames, unlock medals, upgrade your skills and gear and save the world from the evil Demon Lord.

The game is still under development but hopefully you won't encounter too much bugs, crashes, typos or unfinished features if you still find any please contact me! Any feedbacks would be greatly appriciated! 

The game will soon be available for android, IOS, web browsers and win10 :)
